briefdescription.para: No additional constraint.
Perpendicular.
Parallel.
Additional constraints which can be enabled.
Azimuth.
Also for parallel and perpendicular.
This corresponds to distance and relative coordinates.
The CadCapacity enum defines the possible constraints to be set depending on the number of points in the CAD point list (the list of points currently digitized)
is CAD currently enabled for current map tool
Create an advanced digitizing dock widget.

parameterdescription.para: The map canvas on which the widget operates

briefdescription.para: Returns the additional constraints which are used to place perpendicular/parallel segments to snapped segments on the canvas.
Adds point to the CAD point list.
align to segment for additional constraint.

detaileddescription.para:
If additional constraints are used, this will determine the angle to be locked depending on the snapped segment.
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: apply the CAD constraints.

detaileddescription.para:
The will modify the position of the map event in map coordinates by applying the CAD constraints.
false if no solution was found (invalid constraints)

briefdescription.para: determines if CAD tools are enabled or if map tools behaves "nomally"
Filter key events to e.g.

detaileddescription.para: toggle construction mode or adapt constraints

simplesect.para: If the event is hidden (construction mode hides events from the maptool)

briefdescription.para: Clear any cached previous clicks and helper lines.
Removes all points from the CAD point list.
Returns true if a constraint on a common angle is active.
Returns the CadConstraint on the angle.
Returns the CadConstraint on the distance.
Returns the CadConstraint on the X coordinate.
Returns the CadConstraint on the Y coordinate.
construction mode is used to draw intermediate points. These points won't be given any further (i.e. to the map tools)
The last point.

detaileddescription.para: Helper for the CAD point list. The CAD point list is the list of points currently digitized. It contains both "normal" points and intermediate points (construction mode).

briefdescription.para: Disable the widget.

Enables the tool (call this when an appropriate map tool is set and in the condition to make use of cad digitizing) Normally done automatically from QgsMapToolAdvancedDigitizing::activate() but may need to be fine tuned if the map tool depends on preconditions like a feature selection.
Returns the action used to enable/disable the tools.
Disables the CAD tools when hiding the dock.
Returns the point locator match.
The penultimate point.

detaileddescription.para: Helper for the CAD point list. The CAD point list is the list of points currently digitized. It contains both "normal" points and intermediate points (construction mode).

briefdescription.para: The number of points in the CAD point helper list.
The previous point.

detaileddescription.para: Helper for the CAD point list. The CAD point list is the list of points currently digitized. It contains both "normal" points and intermediate points (construction mode).

briefdescription.para: unlock all constraints

parameterdescription.para: set to false to preserve the lock for any constraints set to repeating lock mode

briefdescription.para: Configures list of current CAD points.

detaileddescription.para:
Some map tools may find it useful to override list of CAD points that is otherwise automatically populated when user clicks with left mouse button on map canvas.
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Snapped to a segment.
Is it snapped to a vertex.
Updates canvas item that displays constraints on the ma.
Sometimes a constraint may change the current point out of a mouse event.

detaileddescription.para: This happens normally when a constraint is toggled.

parameterdescription.para: The last known digitizing point. Can be used to emulate a mouse event.

briefdescription.para: Remove any previously emitted warnings (if any)
Push a warning.
activate/deactivate tools.

detaileddescription.para: It is called when tools are activated manually (from the GUI) it will call setCadEnabled to properly update the UI.

briefdescription.para: Sets the additional constraint by clicking on the perpendicular/parallel buttons.
Called when a constraint input widget has lost focus.

detaileddescription.para: Any entered expressions will be converted to their calculated value

briefdescription.para: Called when user has manually altered a constraint value.

detaileddescription.para: Any entered expressions will be left intact

briefdescription.para: lock/unlock a constraint and set its value
Sets the relative properties of constraints.
Sets the repeating lock property of constraints.
enable/disable construction mode (events are not forwarded to the map tool)
settings button triggered
event filter for line edits in the dock UI (angle/distance/x/y line edits)

simplesect.para: defined as private in Python bindings

briefdescription.para: filters key press

simplesect.para: called by eventFilter (filter on line edits), canvasKeyPressEvent (filter on map tool) and keyPressEvent (filter on dock)

briefdescription.para: defines the additional constraint to be used (no/parallel/perpendicular)
Returns the constraint associated with an object.
Attempts to convert a user input value to double, either directly or via expression.
remove previous point in the CAD point list
updates the UI depending on activation of the tools and clear points / release locks.
Returns the first snapped segment.

detaileddescription.para:
Will try to snap a segment using all layers
originalMapPoint
point to be snapped (in map coordinates)
snapped
if given, determines if a segment has been snapped

briefdescription.para: trigger fake mouse move event to update map tool rubber band and/or show new constraints
updateCapacity updates the cad capacities depending on the point list and update the UI according to the capabilities.

parameterdescription.para: if true, it will update the UI even if new capacities are not different from previous ones.

briefdescription.para: Updates a constraint value based on a text input.

parameterdescription.para: user entered text value, may be an expression
set to true to update widget contents to calculated expression value

briefdescription.para: update the current point in the CAD point list
Updates values of constraints that are not locked based on the current point.
The QgsAdvancedDigitizingDockWidget class is a dockable widget used to handle the CAD tools on top of a selection of map tools.

detaileddescription.para: It handles both the UI and the constraints. Constraints are applied by implementing filters called from QgsMapToolAdvancedDigitizing.
